comments.text:
After bug 1635103 is landed, the update verify generator https://searchfox.org/mozilla-central/source/testing/mozharness/scripts/release/update-verify-config-creator.py started generating config files with ja-JP-mac included to all platforms.

Examples:

Update verify config generator task: https://firefox-ci-tc.services.mozilla.com/tasks/LdcZR5OvQV6lQD8dO2O4Kw

Failed test: https://firefox-ci-tc.services.mozilla.com/tasks/AlLFFcx0RauBiWJpZxGabg

We have some options:

1) backout bug 1635103. Not ideal. It would be great to stop using shipped-locales in the tests all together.

2) hardcode the ja-JP-mac exception in the config generator

3) stop using shipped-locales and use https://searchfox.org/mozilla-central/source/browser/locales/l10n-changesets.json

4) We can implement 2) and then 3) so we move faster

comments.raw_text:
Sheriffs were asking about 78.0b3 failures so just to record the full set
* update verify for all platforms, usually chunks 1, 7 or 8, orange on TH
* final verify, blue on TH as it is rerun until it runs out of retries

The root cause is including ja-JP-mac in the list of locales on non-mac, and ja on mac.
comments.creator: nrthomas@gmail.com
